trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> interface and enables object sharing between applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a implementação de base para a interface <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> e permite o compartilhamento de objetos entre aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> é a classe base para todos os componentes no common language runtime que marshaling por referência.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is remotable and derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> é remota e deriva de <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> provides an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> Fornece uma implementação de <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> provides an implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> that marshals by value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> fornece uma implementação de <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> que realiza marshaling de por valor.

trans-unit.source: You can host a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> in any object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface, and you can query and get services from its container.
trans-unit.target: Você pode hospedar uma <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> em qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface e você pode consultar e obter serviços de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The container creates an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> for each <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> it contains.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> para cada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> contém.

trans-unit.source: The container uses the site to manage the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> and is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> to communicate with its container.
trans-unit.target: O contêiner usa o site para gerenciar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> e é usado pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> para se comunicar com seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> should release resources explicitly by calls to its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> deve liberar recursos explicitamente por chamadas para seus <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> método, sem esperar que o gerenciamento automático de memória por meio de uma chamada implícita para o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> is disposed, all components within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> are also disposed.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> é descartado, todos os componentes dentro do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> também são descartados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o componente pode acionar um evento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the component can raise events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o componente pode gerar eventos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão desta propriedade sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> classe deve substituir essa propriedade para fornecer a capacidade de desabilitar a criação de eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> de classe, se o controle está sendo hospedado como um controle ActiveX, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> propriedade retorna `false` se o controle ActiveX tiver seus eventos congelados.

trans-unit.source: If you override this method in a deriving class and change it to return <see langword="false" />, the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList" /> collection returned by the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Component.Events" /> property returns <see langword="null" /> for an event.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir esse método em uma classe derivada e alterá-lo para retornar <see langword="false" />, o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList" /> coleção retornada pelo <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Component.Events" /> propriedade retorna <see langword="null" /> para um evento.

trans-unit.source: Events can still be added and removed from the collection, but the collection's <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Item(System.Object)" /> property will always return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Eventos ainda podem ser adicionados e removidos da coleção, mas a coleção <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList.Item(System.Object)" /> propriedade sempre retornará <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is not encapsulated in an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, se houver, ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> não estiver encapsulado em um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: Os componentes em um contêiner são rastreados em uma primeiro a entrar, primeiro a sair lista que também define a ordem dos componentes dentro do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The last component added is the last component in the list.
trans-unit.target: O último componente adicionado é o último componente na lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is currently in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> está no modo de design no momento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is in design mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> estiver no modo de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The design mode indicator is stored in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; therefore, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> does not have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O indicador de modo de design é armazenado no <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; portanto, se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> não tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associados a ele, o valor dessa propriedade é `false`.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o componente é disposto por uma chamada para o método <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Disposed> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Disposed> delegado, você identificar o método que manipula o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de manipuladores de eventos que estão anexados a este <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList" /> that provides the delegates for this component.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList" /> que fornece os delegados para este componente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Libera recursos não gerenciados e executa outras operações de limpeza antes que <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> seja recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código do aplicativo não deve chamar este método; o método `Finalize` de um objeto é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que a finalização pelo coletor de lixo tenha sido desabilitada por uma chamada para o método <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço fornecido pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that represents a service provided by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> or by its <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto que representa um serviço fornecido pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> ou pelo seu <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents a service provided by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> does not provide the specified service.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa um serviço fornecido pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> não oferecer o serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser substituído por uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is not encapsulated in an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />, the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> does not have an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associated with it, or the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is removed from its <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associado a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> ou, <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> não estiver encapsulado em um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />, o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> não terá um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associado a ele ou o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> será removido do seu <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> will have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> terá um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> se ele tiver sido adicionado a um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> atribui um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> a ele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> is responsible for assigning the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> é responsável pela atribuição de <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> does not necessarily change the name of the site the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor do componente <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> não necessariamente alterar o nome do site de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> é atribuído a.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property should be set only by an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> propriedade deve ser definida somente por um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is `null` if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is removed from its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é `null` se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> é removido do seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Atribuindo `null` para essa propriedade não necessariamente remove o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> do <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> might or might not have a name.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> poderá ou não ter um nome.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name must be unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> é atribuído um nome, o nome deve ser exclusivo entre outras <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objetos dentro seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>; therefore, you can only name a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> if it has an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> armazena o nome do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>; portanto, você só pode nomear um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> se ele tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o nome do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, se houver.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> contendo o nome do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, se houver, ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> estiver sem nome.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> may or may not have a name.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> pode ou não ter um nome.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name is unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> é atribuído um nome, o nome é exclusivo entre outras <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objetos dentro seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> armazena o nome do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> can only have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> só pode ter um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> se ele tiver sido adicionado a um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> atribui um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> a ele.
